com.bizosys.hsearch.filter
Class FilterIds

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.filter.FilterIds

public class FilterIds
extends java.lang.Object

Finds out whether a document carries the matching term hash, document type and term type restricting it inside allowed merged sections (buckets).

Author:
karan
